reviewText: I like this movie but e aware that it does contain just one explicit act.  The movie is very well done and has enough going on in it that it could easily be made longer.  All in all I think it is too short but very good.
Not able to play CD. Probably because it was for the wrong region (B).
From the first frame till the last- picture quality was superb. Coming to the details of movie- cant believe it is just 20+ minutes movie ending with porn style scenes

It was very short. In some ways it reminds me of a one sex scene porn movie in that there's some character and story set up and then you get to the sex scene and then it's over. Except this film isn't porn, it has good acting, good production values, a much more in-depth set-up, and when it ends I was curious where the main character's story was going to go from there.

As for the disk. Some of the extra features don't work in my Region 1 Blu-ray player. It's okay, since I don't speak German but I thought I'd mention it in case someone else is considering this version.

The worst part of this film is it's less than 40mins long

The rest is quite exhilarating and erotic, and quite close to un-simulated sex.
